name: 艾瑞克·戈斯
introduction: After years in the corporate world, Eric stumbled on to Whole World Improv Theatre in 1998. After committing himself to the craft and working his way to a Main Stage Performer, Eric continued to become an integral part of the theatre's management team and ensemble of instructors. It is within this journey that Eric met his wonderful wife, and fellow actor, Lauren Revard.Together they reside near their families in Atlanta, GA, where they have developed successful acting careers.As opportunities continue to present themselves to Eric, he finds himself as Assistant Artistic Director of Whole World Improv Theatre, a successful producer and co-owner of Yes And Films with his wife, martial artist in Hapkido, and an actor with multiple television and film credits.
